channel.title: tree on PattySung
channel.description: Recent content in tree on PattySung

item.title: Leetcode-658. Find K Closest Elements
item.description: Given a sorted integer array arr, two integers k and x, return the k closest integers to x in the array.

item.title: Leetcode-692. Top K Frequent Words
item.description: Given an array of strings words and an integer k, return the k most frequent strings.

item.title: Leetcode-227. Basic Calculator II
item.description: Given a string s which represents an expression, evaluate this expression and return its value.

item.title: Leetcode-102. Binary Tree Level Order Traversal
item.description: Given the root of a binary tree, return the level order traversal of its nodes’ values.

item.title: Leetcode-105. Construct Binary Tree from Preorder and Inorder Traversal
item.description: Given two integer arrays preorder and inorder where preorder is the preorder traversal of a binary tree and inorder is the inorder traversal of the same tree, construct and return the binary tree.

item.title: Leetcode-105. Construct Binary Tree from Preorder and Inorder Traversal
item.description: Given two integer arrays inorder and postorder where inorder is the inorder traversal of a binary tree and postorder is the postorder traversal of the same tree, construct and return the binary tree.

item.title: Leetcode-542. 01 Matrix
item.description: Given an m x n binary matrix mat, return the distance of the nearest 0 for each cell.

item.title: Leetcode-560. Subarray Sum Equals K
item.description: Given an array of integers nums and an integer k, return the total number of subarrays whose sum equals to k.

item.title: Leetcode-701. Insert into a Binary Search Tree
item.description: Example 1: Input: root = [4,2,7,1,3], val = 5 Output: [4,2,7,1,3,5] Explanation: Another accepted tree is: Example 2:

item.title: Leetcode-590. N-ary Tree Postorder Traversal
item.description: Given the root of an n-ary tree, return the postorder traversal of its nodes’ values.

item.title: Leetcode-700. Search in a Binary Search Tree
item.description: You are given the root of a binary search tree (BST) and an integer val.

item.title: Leetcode-117. Populating Next Right Pointers in Each Node II
item.description: Given a binary tree struct Node { int val; Node *left; Node *right; Node *next; } Populate each next pointer to point to its next right node.

item.title: Leetcode-230. Kth Smallest Element in a BST
item.description: Given the root of a binary search tree, and an integer k, return the kth smallest value (1-indexed) of all the values of the nodes in the tree.

item.title: Leetcode-101. Symmetric Tree
item.description: Given the root of a binary tree, check whether it is a mirror of itself (i.

item.title: Leetcode-112. Path Sum
item.description: Given the root of a binary tree and an integer targetSum, return true if the tree has a root-to-leaf path such that adding up all the values along the path equals targetSum.

item.title: Leetcode-235. Lowest Common Ancestor of a Binary Search Tree
item.description: Given a binary search tree (BST), find the lowest common ancestor (LCA) node of two given nodes in the BST.

item.title: Leetcode-236. Lowest Common Ancestor of a Binary Tree
item.description: Given a binary tree, find the lowest common ancestor (LCA) of two given nodes in the tree.

item.title: Leetcode-530. Minimum Absolute Difference in BST
item.description: Given the root of a Binary Search Tree (BST), return the minimum absolute difference between the values of any two different nodes in the tree.

item.title: Leetcode-637. Average of Levels in Binary Tree
item.description: Given the root of a binary tree, return the average value of the nodes on each level in the form of an array.

item.title: Leetcode-100. Same Tree
item.description: Given the roots of two binary trees p and q, write a function to check if they are the same or not.

item.title: Leetcode-110. Balanced Binary Tree
item.description: Given a binary tree, determine if it is height-balanced. Example 1:

item.title: Leetcode-572. Subtree of Another Tree
item.description: Given the roots of two binary trees root and subRoot, return true if there is a subtree of root with the same structure and node values of subRoot and false otherwise.

item.title: Queue
item.description: 在使用 Java 的 Queue 接口時，可以使用以下方法進行操作： offer(element): 將元素插入到佇列的尾部，如果成功插入，返回 true；如果無法插入（例如因為佇列已滿），返回 false。 add(element): 將元素插入到佇列的尾部，如果成功插入，返回 true；如果無法插入（例如因為佇列已滿），則拋出一個 unchecked 異常（IllegalStateException）。

item.title: Leetcode-104. Maximum Depth of Binary Tree
item.description: Given the root of a binary tree, return its maximum depth.

item.title: Leetcode-226. Invert Binary Tree
item.description: Given the root of a binary tree, invert the tree, and return its root.

item.title: Leetcode-543. Diameter of Binary Tree
item.description: Given the root of a binary tree, return the length of the diameter of the tree.

item.title: Leetcode-704. Binary Search
item.description: Given an array of integers nums which is sorted in ascending order, and an integer target, write a function to search target in nums.
